transcript:
Customer: Om bhu bhuva swaha tatsaviturvarenyam bhargo devasya dhimahi dhiyo yo nah prachodayat
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Haan ji Raman ji se baat kar rahe hain? Raman se namaskar, main ji baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Sir abhi aapki voice se baat hui, unhone bataya ki subscription ke regarding jo bhi issues the woh maine unko bataya hai. But rest sir mere ko wohi aapko ek video call pe ek baar woh pura guide karna tha. Toh sir abhi aap free hain?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji batao.
Executive: Usse maine link share kara hua hai aapke mail pe, main dobara link share kar raha hun, aap join kariye. Main aapko guide karta hun.
Executive: Kis tarike se aapko apni leads vagera ka feedback share karna hai woh pura main aapko guide karta hun. Ek baar main link share kar raha hun, aap join kariye hai na?
Customer: Ek minute sir.
Customer: Magar discord dijiye mail.
Executive: Sir check kariye mail pe gaya hoga aapke pe.
Customer: Hmm. Hello.
Executive: Ya.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Sir link mila aapko mail pe?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji sir join kariye usko.
Executive: Kaise join kar rahe ho sir?
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Sir join kariye usko.
Executive: Link mila hoga sir aapko apni mail id pe ek video call ka.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji aa gaya. Hmm. Usse join kariye.
Customer: Sir sir aapki voice judda karna?
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Join ho gaya sir. Us link ko open kariye. Link aaya hoga join with Google Meet ka, usse join kariye.
Customer: Camera se mobile ho gaya sir. Kinne jana? Thode se hum toh saste hunde. Saste hi hona tha.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji Raman sir.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji. Join ho gaya vaise.
Executive: Sir nahi hua join abhi aapki side se.
Executive: Sir aapne purane wale link pe toh nikal gaye, maine do baar link bheje. Jo naya wala bheja hai na, abhi us pe join kariye.
Executive: Raman sir mila link?
Executive: Hello. Haan ji haan ji do minute sir. Hmm join ho gaya sir. Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Sir ab main call disconnect kar raha hun, mute kar raha hun main aapko, theek hai?
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Raman sir meri aawaz aa raha hai?
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Raman sir meri aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji.
Executive: Aawaz aa rahi hai sir meri aapko? Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Toh sir system se voice chalu kariye mujhe abhi phone se connect karna voice clear hai.
Customer: Phone pe phone pe.
Executive: Sir system se sir voice nahi ho payegi kya?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir aap apna IndiaMART open kariye ek baar.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir aap meeting se ja chuke ho, aap rejoin kariye meeting ko. Then apni screen share kariye.
Customer: Haan ji. Rejoin the reason.
Executive: Sir rejoin kariye meeting ko.
Executive: Raman sir link pe dobara click karke join kariye usko.
Executive: Raman sir is I am audible to you?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello sir link pe dobara jaiye mail pe jaake us link ko dobara join kariye sir.
Executive: Sir is I am audible?
Executive: Raman sir is I am audible to you?
Executive: Raman sir Raman sir is I am audible to you?
Executive: Sir abhi aap apni screen share kariye.
Customer: Haan ji. Aap IndiaMART open kariye sir.
Customer: Kaunsa kya kehta?
Executive: Sir IndiaMART open kariye abhi seller.indiamart.com open kariye.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir aap meeting se left ho chuke ho again, aap meeting dobara se join kariye sir.
Customer: Hello kal karenge ya aaj nahi mere paas time hai. Teen char bar toh ho gaya.
Executive: Sir aapka sir aapka yeh
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs guidance on subscription issues.

- Customer is having trouble joining the meeting.

- Customer is unable to share screen.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the meeting link multiple times.

- Executive tried to guide customer to rejoin meeting.

- Executive tried to troubleshoot voice issues.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer will call tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Annoyed



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, video call, screen sharing, meeting link
